Title: Relates to the removal of weight and height restrictions on vehicles traveling from the Ogdensburg bridge south to the Port of Ogdensburg
Summary: Removes the weight and height restrictions on vehicles traveling south on the route from the Ogdensburg bridge to the Port of Ogdensburg.
LawCode: Amd ยง385, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the allowable dimensions and weights of vehicles traveling on highways and bridges
